alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 11:39PM CDT until June 17 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND RICHARDSON COUNTIES... At 1139 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Falls City, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Falls City, Rulo, Verdon, Stella, Shubert, Nemaha, Salem, Preston, Barada, Sac and Fox Nation Reservation, Brownville State Recreation Area, Indian Cave State Park and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
